title: How Much Do Truck Drivers Make?
excerpt: Explore the average salary and benefits of truck drivers in the United States.
author: Jane Doe
content: Truck driving is a vital profession that keeps goods moving across the country. Salaries for truck drivers can vary based on factors such as experience, location, and type of freight. On average, truck drivers in the United States make around $45,000 to $70,000 per year. Some drivers, especially those with specialized skills or routes, can earn significantly more.
